import React from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'
import asabenehImage from './images/asabeneh.jpg'

// Fuction to show month date year

const showDate=(time)=>
{
  const months=[
      'January',
      'February',
      'March',
      'April',
      'May',
      'June',
      'July',
      'August',
      'September',
      'October',
      'November',
      'December'
  ]

  const month=months.[time.getMonth()].slice(0,3)
  

}
